author: Jared Davis
comment: The tardis looks great

author: George Liu
comment: Its okay but the issue i have is the time covers up where notifications show on the watch when its in standbys mode so your seeing white text over white text.  That's my only flaw.  I own a Hauwei Smart watch.    The tardis watchface looks bright and bold especially when in standbys mode.  I have yet to try the sonic screwdrivers yet but from what I see, I have a winner.
title: Okay but

author: Kate Myers
comment: I love the Tardis opening to show different characters,  but sometimes it gets stuck and I can't get it to show the time!   Fix that and it would be perfect!
title: One tiny flaw

author: Brandon Moon
comment: Nice detail, but peek cards cover up the date and part of the time.
title: Fun theme

author: David Gattenberg
comment: Ok , but time covers up half the TARDIS.. and the screwdriver ones look a bit off center
title: Ok

author: Dawn Goodnight
comment: I like it, but I can't figure out how to change to 24-hour time. Will have to come back to this when that's working.

reply.author: Fat Russell
reply.content: Hi Dawn! To change to 24 hour: when you are scrolling through and selecting the watch face, you should see a tiny cog icon below the face. Click that, and the watch will allow you to pick 12 or 24 hour mode. Hope this helps!

author: Lisa Pollard
comment: Not compatible with moto g
title: Time and space watch face

author: Molten Hope
comment: Not compatible with Galaxy Gear 2.
title: Needs more compatibility

author: Kieran Vella
comment: Love these watch faces! Live the little detail in the tardis one too!
title: love it!

author: Carlos Sanchez
comment: very happy with this watch face!  perfect for using on Saturdays when episodes come out!

author: Ryan Wiggs
comment: It's a great app 10 out 10

author: Adam Neeworth
comment: Plz make new Tardis Exterior And Screwdriver.
title: Love it

author: Marcus Burnett
comment: I'm digging it.....

author: Scott Ohara
comment: Very cute!

author: Chris Ram
comment: It was splendid

author: Mary Sharp
comment: This is a great watch face! Is there anyway to have a battery indicator in one of the corners of the TARDIS face? Or maybe the blinking light could be a rough gauge of sorts when the watch is dim? I think I found the Easter egg but can't remember what it is?
title: Love it!

author: George Chachanidze
comment: I noticed that when in ambient mode on my G watch R, the whole face was still lit, and it really causes a dent in battery life, it would be nice if the empty bits were off instead of a fake black
title: Cool, 1 minor improvement

author: Sami K.
comment: I had a problem where I couldn't get the faces to show up, the Dev quickly replied and helped me figure it out. These are the types of people we need more of. Thank you!
title: Cool looking faces and awesome dev

author: Ted Miller
comment: 7 stars if you're working on more faces! P.S, I wave the sonic screwdriver faces over locked doors and they remain locked. Please look into this.

reply.author: Fat Russell
reply.content: Ted - Darn it, those sonic screwdrivers were supposed to work. Let me look into this....   ;)

title: Only worth 6 stars

author: mason randall
comment: I love all three of the watch faces! It also helps that the developer is fantastic and responded to my emails so quickly! Again, really nice job with this! Keep up the good work!
title: Really nice!

author: Jon Gurrola
comment: In that there is no disruption of the reminders or notifications,  while still showing the time and date! 😊😀
title: The layout fits perfectly

author: Michael Felleman
comment: Just downloaded it. Love it. I would like to request a low bit mode for the G Watch though, if that's a possibility. Great work!
title: Beautiful.

author: Tara Murphy
comment: Would like to be able to set 24 hour Revised: Now 5 stars since the recent update added 24 hour time. Excellent response from the Dev.

reply.author: Fat Russell
reply.content: Hi Tara, thank you! We are working on getting a 24 hour option - stay tuned!

title: Very nice!

author: Chelsea
comment: I was so excited when I first downloaded this app! However as I was scrolling through my apps I realized I couldn't find it- anywhere. I looked on my home page and it wasn't there. I'm deleting this app.

reply.author: Fat Russell
reply.content: Hi Chelsea. there is no app for your phone. This only has watch faces for Android Wear devices like the moto 360, LG G Watch , ASUS ZenWatch, etc. you should be able to select the face on a Wear watch by doing a long press on your current watch face. I hope this helps.

title: Could Not Find It

author: Chris Yunke
comment: Not working for my Moto 360

reply.author: Fat Russell
reply.content: Hi Chris - sometimes these take awhile to show up. If it's still giving you trouble, try un-installing and re-installing it, and that should do the trick. Let us know if that fixes the issue for you!

title: Ummm

author: Rachel Wilson
comment: I love this watch face, needed for any who loves the Doctor!
title: Sweet

author: Bradford Stokes
comment: Add the weather and it would be better or add a better tardis
title: Ok

author: Reloader N00b
comment: Great watch face for whovians,  still have not found the easter eggs but keeping my eyes open.  Only thing to make it better would be a 24 hr display option

reply.author: Fat Russell
reply.content: Hi Ira! Thanks for that! Also, the Easter Egg is in the "Police Box" watch face - keep it active at noon and midnight - and you'll see something special!

title: Still looking

author: Carrie Lathrop
comment: Love the tardis watch gave on my google watch. You made my day as I could never find a watch face I liked
title: Love it

author: Andy Thomson
comment: This looks awesome on my G Watch, thanks to the developer!
title: Great watch face.

author: Sam Wyatt
comment: Timey Whimey (I think thats how you spell it :S)
title: It's so...

author: Clarence Moore
comment: Molto bene!

author: Josh Bryson
comment: Timey Wimey!

author: Jeanne Sutton
comment: Can't decide between the 10th Doctor's screwdriver or the 12th's?  No problem...switch back and forth between the two.  Or maybe stick with the classic TARDIS!  A wonderful watch face to keep up with all the timey wimey details.
title: A must have for any Whovian!

author: John Catral
comment: Wow! What a perfect watch face for Whovians like me.  Made by the wonderful and talented artist, Virginia Poltrack.  Get it! What are you waiting for?!? Allonsy!
title: What an awesome watch face for us Whovians!

author: Michael Boshears
comment: Amazing app I've been looking for.  Just can't figure out the easter eggs.  :(  I'll keep trying though!

reply.author: Fat Russell
reply.content: Hi Michael! The Easter Egg is in the "Police Box" watch face - keep it active at noon and midnight - and you'll see something special!

title: Awesome

author: James Cha
comment: Great job on this app! Much need for us whovians!
title: Fantastic!

author: J K
comment: Congratulations! You made an awesome app!
title: Nice

author: Jorge Wiegand
comment: Would be great a 24h option 🙋

reply.author: Fat Russell
reply.content: Hi Jorge - thank you! We are working on getting a 24 hour option, stay tuned!

title: Amazing!

author: rick sare almost daily vlog
comment: I will be sporting this tomorrow night at Disney with my Timelord shirt
title: Awesomeness
